question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
February $1$, $2008$ is a Friday.  The last Friday of February $2008$ will be February $x$, $2008$.  If $2008$ is a leap year, what is the value of $x$?
inference:
February has $29$ days in a leap year.  The last Friday of February $2008$ will be $29$ days after the first Friday of February $2008$, which is $29$ days after February $1$, $2008$.  Since February $1$, $2008$ is a Friday, the last Friday of February $2008$ will be $\boxed{29}$ days after February $1$, $2008$, which is February $29$, $2008$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{29}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: If 2008 is a leap year, that means there are 29 days in February, and February 29 is $28=7\cdot4$ days after February 1, so it is also a Friday. Thus, $x=\boxed{29}$.
